column5: whats the usual rig down at bronte creek or the credit river? while fish are in the creeks

Six #5 trebles, all snelled in a line about 2 feet long Seriously, I see flyfisherman down there, guys putting jigs/flies/roebags under floats...the occasional spinner being tossed in...take a walk down there and watch for a while...you can learn a lot
ya i see people bottom fishing under the bridge but in streams people float fish...just wondering how they rig it
